Name: The Comeback
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
7.5 ml Maple shrub (1:1.2 cider vinegar to maple syrup)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A complex cocktail with apricot fruit at the forefront and underlying fernet bitterness.
History: Created in 2015 by Constanca Cordeiro at Peg + Patriot, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of The Comeback contains 135 calories
